name: OR_LOG_ANES_COMM
description: The OR_LOG_ANES_COMM table contains OR management system log anesthesia comments.

columns.name: LOG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the surgical log of the anesthesia comments.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The number of the line of the anesthesia comment for this surgical log.

columns.name: ANESTH_COMMENTS
columns.description: The free text anesthesia comments for the log.
